content:
mosha chamacchoraa-petakadrushtaantham
mariyaame! Shlommo-jeevajalatthin munkuriyaam
roohaa than shoshappaa shlom
aishaayan daaveeduktham
sthiramaam purame shlommo nin
udaratthee-nnudayam cheytheeshan.

slee-baayenthi, saatthaanotelppaan
sahadenmaar chennu-khadgatthaal mruthiyettorum
theeyaal venneeraayorum
poril kaattiya veeryatthaal
saatthaan kopaakulanaayi
nalkuka thal praarththanayaal punyam.

naathaa! Nin meyyum -rakthavumettoraam
mruthare siddharkkaay-pande sajjeekruthamaakum
panthikkanpo-tirutthaname.
Nin sharane maranam poondor
ninne ettoraamavare
elkkaname - thaathankal neeyum

1. Janani, parishuddha-praarththanayaal naathaa!
Punyam njangalkkum vigathar'kkum nalka.

2. Mariyaamin maranam-varadaayakamaaka
thal praarththana njangal-kkaathmaavinu kotta.

3. Parishuddha shleehaa-nibi, sahadenmaare!
Yaachippin krupaye-njangalkkaayu ningal.

4. Nin sharane mrutharaam-thaatha sahodararil
choriyaname moda-ppanineeran naathaa!

5. Susmruthi jananikkum-vishruthi siddharkkum
jeevan vigatharkkum-cherppone! Sthothram!
6. Janani, parishuddha-praarththanayaal naathaa!
Punyam njangalkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.
vaayanakkaaran:- neethimaanmaarute kootaaratthil mahatthuvatthinreyum, rakshayuteyum shabdam ennu daaveedu mukhaa tharam parishuddharoohaa-paati.
